TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PasswordDeriveBytes extends System.Security.Cryptography.DeriveBytes

summary.span: 使用 PBKDF1 演算法的擴充功能，從密碼衍生金鑰。

span.span: Derives a key from a password using an extension of the PBKDF1 algorithm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別會使用 PBKDF1 演算法的 PKCS #5 v2.0 標準中定義的延伸模組，從密碼衍生適用於作為金鑰內容的位元組。This class uses an extension of the PBKDF1 algorithm defined in the PKCS#5 v2.0 standard to derive bytes suitable for use as key material from a password. 標準記載於 IETF RRC 2898 中。The standard is documented in IETF RRC 2898. > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會硬式編碼在原始程式碼中的密碼。Never hard-code a password within your source code. 可使用的組件從擷取的硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)工具、 十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟文字編輯器 （例如 notepad.exe) 中的組件。Hard coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) tool, a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor like notepad.exe. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會從密碼使用建立機碼類別。The following code example creates a key from a password using the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/cpp/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/VB/sample.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 永遠不會將密碼寫在原始程式碼中。Never hard code a password within your source code. 可以使用的組件擷取硬式編碼的密碼[Ildasm.exe （IL 解譯器）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)，十六進位的編輯器，或藉由直接開啟 Notepad.exe 之類的文字編輯器中的組件。Hard-coded passwords can be retrieved from an assembly using the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md), a hex editor, or by simply opening up the assembly in a text editor such as Notepad.exe. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會從密碼使用建立機碼類別。The following code example creates a key from a password using the class. MemberSignature.Value: public byte[] CryptDeriveKey (string algname, string alghashname, int keySize, byte[] rgbIV);
.method public hidebysig instance unsigned int8[] CryptDeriveKey(string algname, string alghashname, int32 keySize, unsigned int8[] rgbIV) cil managed
Public Function CryptDeriveKey (algname As String, alghashname As String, keySize As Integer, rgbIV As Byte()) As Byte()
public: cli::array <System::Byte> ^ CryptDeriveKey(System::String ^ algname, System::String ^ alghashname, int keySize, cli::array <System::Byte> ^ rgbIV);

param.name: algname
param.span: 用來衍生金鑰的演算法名稱。

span.span: The algorithm name for which to derive the key.

param.name: alghashname
param.span: 要用來衍生金鑰的雜湊演算法名稱。

span.span: The hash algorithm name to use to derive the key.

param.name: keySize
param.span: 要衍生的金鑰大小 (以位元為單位)。

span.span: The size of the key, in bits, to derive.

param.name: rgbIV
param.span: 用來衍生金鑰的初始化向量 (IV)。

span.span: The initialization vector (IV) to use to derive the key.

summary.span: 從 物件衍生密碼編譯金鑰。

span.span: Derives a cryptographic key from the object.
The derived key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此函式是 Crypto API 函式 CryptDeriveKey()，包裝函式，為了提供互通性與使用 Crypto API 的應用程式。This function is a wrapper for the Crypto API function CryptDeriveKey(), and is intended to offer interoperability with applications using the Crypto API. 如果`keySize`參數設定為 0 位元時，使用指定的演算法的預設大小。If the `keySize` parameter is set to 0 bits, the default key size for the specified algorithm is used. ## Examples 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/cpp/sample.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/CS/sample.cs#2)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.PasswordDerivedbytes/VB/sample.vb#2)]

span.span: The parameter is incorrect.
-or-

exception.span: 無法取得密碼編譯服務提供者 (CSP)。

span.span: The cryptographic service provider (CSP) cannot be acquired.
-or-

exception.span: 參數不是有效的演算法名稱。

span.span: The parameter is not a valid algorithm name.
-or-

exception.span: 參數不是有效的雜湊演算法名稱。

span.span: The parameter is not a valid hash algorithm name.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 類別所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the class and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和`Finalize`方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the `Finalize` method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. `Finalize` 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。`Finalize` invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在覆寫，請小心不要參考到先前處置之前呼叫中的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md).

MemberSignature.Value: public override byte[] GetBytes (int cb);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance unsigned int8[] GetBytes(int32 cb) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetBytes (cb As Integer) As Byte()
public: override cli::array <System::Byte> ^ GetBytes(int cb);

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Rfc2898DeriveBytes replaces PasswordDeriveBytes for deriving key material from a password and is preferred in new applications.")

param.name: cb
param.span: 要產生的似隨機金鑰位元組數量。

span.span: The number of pseudo-random key bytes to generate.

summary.span: 傳回似隨機金鑰位元組。

span.span: Returns pseudo-random key bytes.

returns.span: 位元組陣列，以虛擬隨機金鑰位元組填入。

span.span: A byte array filled with pseudo-random key bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以建立任意數目的虛擬隨機位元組。This method can create any number of pseudo-random bytes. 不過，雜湊輸出中的位元組數目受限於位元組序列的強度。However, the strength of the byte sequence is limited by the number of bytes in the hash output.

MemberSignature.Value: public string HashName { get; set; }
.property instance string HashName
Public Property HashName As String
public: property System::String ^ HashName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用於操作的雜湊演算法名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the hash algorithm for the operation.

value.span: 用於操作的雜湊演算法名稱。

span.span: The name of the hash algorithm for the operation.

exception.span: 雜湊值 (Hash Value) 的名稱是固定的，並且會嘗試變更這個值。

span.span: The name of the hash value is fixed and an attempt is made to change this value.

MemberSignature.Value: public int IterationCount { get; set; }
.property instance int32 IterationCount
Public Property IterationCount As Integer
public: property int IterationCount { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定操作的重複次數。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of iterations for the operation.
The number of iterations for the operation.

exception.span: 重複次數是固定的，並且會嘗試變更這個值。

span.span: The number of iterations is fixed and an attempt is made to change this value.

exception.span: 無法設定此屬性，因為它的值超出範圍。

span.span: The property cannot be set because its value is out of range.

exception.span: 這個屬性需要非負數的數字。

span.span: This property requires a non-negative number.

MemberSignature.Value: public override void Reset ();
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void Reset() cil managed
Public Overrides Sub Reset ()
public: override void Reset();

span.span: Resets the state of the operation.

MemberSignature.Value: public byte[] Salt { get; set; }
.property instance unsigned int8[] Salt
Public Property Salt As Byte()
public: property cli::array <System::Byte> ^ Salt { cli::array <System::Byte> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::Byte> ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定用於操作的金鑰 Salt 值。

span.span: Gets or sets the key salt value for the operation.

value.span: 用於操作的金鑰 Salt 值。

span.span: The key salt value for the operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字典攻擊是攻擊者嘗試藉由比較加密的值與最可能的索引鍵的先前計算加密值解密加密的訊息。A dictionary attack is an attack in which the attacker attempts to decrypt an encrypted message by comparing the encrypted value with previously computed encrypted values for the most likely keys. 這種攻擊會由導入的密碼金鑰衍生之前的結尾的隨機位元組更為困難。This attack is made much more difficult by the introduction of random bytes at the end of the password before the key derivation. 這些隨機位元組稱為 salt。These random bytes are known as salt.

exception.span: 金鑰 Salt 值是固定的，並且會嘗試變更這個值。

span.span: The key salt value is fixed and an attempt is made to change this value.
